data.text: Alatala sikeeli kamalitare nan xɔnxi,
Yɛtɛ igboɲa findima yaagi nan na,
Tinxinyi tinxintɔɛ raɲɛrɛma nɛ,
Naafuli mu mixi malima Ala xa kiiti lɔxɔɛ,
Tinxinyi tinxintɔɛ raɲɛrɛma nɛ kira fanyi xɔn,
Tinxinyi tinxintɔɛ rakisima nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi na faxa, sese mu sɔɔnɛyama a bɛ sɔnɔn.
Tinxintɔɛ ratangama nɛ ɲaxankatɛ ma,
Mixi kobi a boore xun nakanama a xa wɔyɛnyie nan na,
Tinxintɔɛe na hɛɛri sɔtɔ, taa ɲɛlɛxinma nɛ.
Tinxintɔɛe munafanyi rafama nɛ a xa taa ma,
Lɔnnitare yoma nɛ a boore ma,
Naafixi gundo makɛnɛnma nɛ,
Marasitareɲa ɲama rabirama nɛ,
Mixi yo taani mixi bɛ fe nde ma, a fama nɛ nimisade.
Ginɛ fanyie binyɛ sɔtɔma nɛ,
Xɛmɛ fanyi ɲɛrɛ ki a malima nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi xa geeni fama nɛ a madaxude.
Tinxintɔɛ kisima nɛ,
Bɔɲɛ ɲaaxi mu rafan Alatala ma,
Mixi ɲaaxi fama nɛ fe ɲaaxi sɔtɔde,
Ginɛ tofanyi xaxilitare luma nɛ alɔ
Tinxintɔɛ fama nɛ fe fanyi sɔtɔde,
Mixi naxan bɛlɛxɛ yelefu ki tide, a bannaya sɔtɔma nɛ,
Mixi naxan a harige itaxunma, a fama nɛ harige sɔtɔde.
Ɲama mixi dankama nɛ naxan tondima baloe matide,
Fe fanyi rabae, fe fanyi sɔtɔma nɛ,
Mixi naxan a xaxili tima a xa naafuli ra,
Mixi naxan tɔɔrɛ bɛndunma a xa denbaya ma,
Tinxintɔɛe kisima nɛ,
Xa tinxintɔɛ a sare sɔtɔ duniɲa ma,
